Detailed Description

Configure Look Up Table based DPC.

struct vpsissIpipeDpcLutConfig

Field Documentation

uint32_t vpsissIpipeDpcLutConfig::blackOrWhite

TRUE configures to replace with white dot, replaced with black dot otherwise. Applicable only when method 0 is choosen. The LUT entry chooses the method to be employed

uint32_t vpsissIpipeDpcLutConfig::enableLutDpc

TRUE enables Look Up Table (LUT) DPC module.

uint32_t vpsissIpipeDpcLutConfig::lutAddr

Address of the LUT to be used

uint32_t vpsissIpipeDpcLutConfig::lutMode

TRUE specifies the LUT specified is for the whole frame, Otherwise upto 1024 valid entries in LUT

uint32_t vpsissIpipeDpcLutConfig::lutSize

Size of LUT
